scripts.restart: echo 'ðŸ” Checking for running node processes...' && ps aux | grep node | grep -v grep || echo 'No node processes found' && echo 'ðŸ”ª Killing all node processes...' && pkill -9 node || true && echo 'âœ… Processes killed' && echo 'ðŸš€ Starting Strapi...' && npm run start
scripts.kill-port: echo 'ðŸ” Checking port 1337...' && lsof -ti:1337 || echo 'Port 1337 is free' && echo 'ðŸ”ª Killing process on port 1337...' && lsof -ti:1337 | xargs kill -9 || true && echo 'âœ… Port 1337 is now free'
scripts.force-start: echo 'ðŸ” Checking port 1337...' && (lsof -ti:1337 && echo 'âš ï¸  Port 1337 is in use, killing process...' && lsof -ti:1337 | xargs kill -9 && echo 'âœ… Process killed' || echo 'âœ… Port 1337 is already free') && echo 'ðŸš€ Starting Strapi...' && npm run start
